ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Are slow horses worth getting?
ygData.msgSnippet: Cool tip! This I did not know! Thanks! Durgaa
ygData.messageBody:
Cool tip! This I did not know!

Thanks!
Durgaa

>_______________________________________________________________________

>Message: 3
> Date: Mon, 04 Jul 2005 01:03:25 -0000
> From: "soonerweb" <soonerweb@...>
>Subject: Re: Digest Number 1193
>
>Ahhh the old head in your way when you cast trick.....you can do away
>with that if you have an enchanter in the group or if you have an
>illusion mask....if you have a horse ....cast your horse....then
>either click your illusion mask or have an enchanter cast an illusion
>on you....then after the illusion is on you....just click the
>illusion off and your horses head will disappear from your
>screen....its a neat little trick to be able to see a little better.--
>
>
>
>
